trans-unit.source: Provides the data for the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce i dati per l'evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated" />.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: A tracking service that implements the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification> interface raises a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event to notify the runtime tracking infrastructure that the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for a particular workflow <xref:System.Type> has changed.
trans-unit.target: Un servizio di rilevamento che implementa l'interfaccia <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification> genera un evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> per notificare all'infrastruttura di rilevamento di runtime che l'elemento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> per un determinato oggetto <xref:System.Type> del flusso di lavoro è stato modificato.

trans-unit.source: The tracking service uses a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs> to provide the workflow <xref:System.Type> and the new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> to the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Il servizio di rilevamento utilizza un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs> per fornire l'oggetto <xref:System.Type> del flusso di lavoro e il nuovo oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> all'infrastruttura di rilevamento di runtime.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> uses a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs> when it raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService> utilizza <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs> quando genera l’evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.SqlTrackingService.ProfileUpdated?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: When it receives a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event, the runtime tracking infrastructure will update the tracking profile for the specified workflow <xref:System.Type> in its profile cache.
trans-unit.target: Quando riceve un evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>, l'infrastruttura di rilevamento di runtime aggiorna il profilo di rilevamento per l'oggetto <xref:System.Type> del flusso di lavoro specificato nella cache dei profili.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: If you use this constructor when you raise a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event inside a tracking service, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se si utilizza questo costruttore quando si genera un evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> in un servizio di rilevamento, è necessario impostare in modo esplicito le proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of workflow for which the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" /> has changed.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Type" /> del flusso di lavoro per il quale l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" /> è stato modificato.

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" />.
trans-unit.target: Nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs" /> class that specifies a new <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" /> for the specified workflow <see cref="T:System.Type" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs" /> che specifica un nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" /> per l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Type" /> del flusso di lavoro specificato.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs> is created with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> set to the specified <xref:System.Type> and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> set to the specified profile.
trans-unit.target: Viene creata una nuova istanza dell'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs> con la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> impostata sulla classe <xref:System.Type> specificata e la proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> impostata sul profilo specificato.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the new <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" /> for the workflow Type.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" /> per il tipo di flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" /> for the workflow type.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" /> per il tipo di flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: When the runtime tracking infrastructure receives a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event it will update its profile cache with the new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow <xref:System.Type> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'infrastruttura di rilevamento di runtime riceve un evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>, aggiorna la rispettiva cache dei profili con il nuovo oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> per l'oggetto <xref:System.Type> del flusso di lavoro specificato da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the workflow whose <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" /> should be updated.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Type" /> del flusso di lavoro il cui oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile" /> deve essere aggiornato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of a workflow.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Type" /> di un flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> specifies the workflow <xref:System.Type> for which the tracking profile has changed.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileRemovedEventArgs.WorkflowType%2A> specifica l'oggetto <xref:System.Type> del flusso di lavoro per il quale il profilo di rilevamento è stato modificato.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> is set to the new tracking profile.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ProfileUpdatedEventArgs.TrackingProfile%2A> è impostata sul nuovo profilo di rilevamento.

trans-unit.source: When the runtime tracking infrastructure receives a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated> event it will update its profile cache with the new <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> for the workflow <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: Quando l'infrastruttura di rilevamento di runtime riceve un evento <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.IProfileNotification.ProfileUpdated>, aggiorna la rispettiva cache dei profili con il nuovo oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile> per l'oggetto <xref:System.Type> del flusso di lavoro.
